documents.document: A Classy Hotel This hotel is top notch. A beautiful room with a view of the harbor and beach. Excellent dining facilities, excellent staff. I usually stay at the Hilton but between the pro-bowl and multiple conventions no openings where available. The Ilikai was a very pleasant surprise. No complaints what so ever.In conversation with the bar staff it was reveiled that the hotel is being sold as of April.
Ho-Hum What a boring stay. feeble tiny pool. questionable food service. Very clean. I don't intend to stay here again
